translated: With a causally-dependently arisen phenomenon as condition, a causally-dependently arisen phenomenon arises, a condition being by way of cause: With one causally-dependently arisen aggregate as condition, the three aggregates and the materiality originated by consciousness. With two aggregates as condition, two aggregates and the materiality originated by consciousness. At the time of rebirth-linking, with the three mental aggregates as condition, the materiality of the four elements. With the four great element as condition, the materiality that is derived from the great elements. With the materiality that is derived from the great elements as condition, the four great elements. With the four great elements and the materiality that is derived from the great elements as condition, the mind element. With the mind element as condition, the eye element. With the eye element as condition, the visual-data element. With the visual-data element as condition, consciousness of the visual data. With consciousness of the visual data as condition, eye-contact. With eye-contact as condition, feeling born of eye-contact. With feeling born of eye-contact as condition, craving born of eye-contact. With craving born of eye-contact as condition, attachment born of eye-contact. With attachment born of eye-contact as condition, existence born of eye-contact. With existence born of eye-contact as condition, future renewed existence. With future renewed existence as condition, birth. With birth as condition, ageing, death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, grief, and despair come to be. So there is an origination of this whole mass of suffering. With a causally-dependently arisen phenomenon as condition, a causally-independent phenomenon arises, a condition being by way of cause: With the causally-dependently arisen aggregates as condition, eye-sensitivity. At the time of rebirth-linking, with the three mental aggregates as condition, the four great elements. With the four great elements as condition, the eye faculty. With the four great elements as condition, the ear faculty. With the four great elements as condition, the nose faculty. With the four great elements as condition, the tongue faculty. With the four great elements as condition, the body faculty. With the four great elements as condition, the heart-basis. With the four
